text: @realDonaldTrump The Stanford Seroprevalence Test in Santa Clara-begins to unmask the Covid-19 TRUTH-there is Herd Immunity-thats what the decending curves may actually illustrate-NOT Social Distancing.  Unconstitutional "Stay at Home" and Social Distancing-MUST STOP NOW-ECONOMY MUST SURVIVE
